descriptions:
["DescriptionThe Noble House Real Estate is proud to offer this ultra-chic brand new mansion in the heart of Emirates Hills surrounded by the lakes and golf course. The villa's  location almost  gives you a feeling of an island with 32,556 sq.ft plot and 27,000 sq. ft built up area. This property has utmost privacy both from its entrance and its location. The front of the villa faces the lake and golf course with a large pool and deck ideally suitable for a quiet family evening or a large party.
The Villa Features:
•  Full Spa
•  Large guest wing
•  Gymnasium Area
•  Cinema and Private Entertainment Area 
•  Separate informal and a formal dining room
•  2 Family room on the ground floor that overlooks the lake
•  Spacious office/guest bedroom with ensuite bathrooms and large walk in closet
•  Air-conditioned basement garage with parking and private ramp for multiple cars.
•  Modern kitchen with separate bar and serving counters. Ideally suited for entertainment.  
Emirates Hills is the flagship community of Emirates Living, the most sought-after community in Dubai where high net worth individuals live – consisting of exclusive custom-built properties offering amazing views.
For arranged viewings pls call The Noble House Real Estate at +97144566135 or for more details and images of the property, visit our website at www.tnh.ae."]

Dubai Hills is located within Mohammad Bin Rashid City and is conveniently located off Al Khail Road and Umm Suqueim Road, only minutes away from Mall of the Emirates and Sheikh Zayed Road.
